alert.note: Alert for Sandusky; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 3:39PM EDT until July 26 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... Sandusky County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 339 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Oregon to near Woodville to near Arcadia, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Tiffin, Fremont, Fostoria, Bellevue, Clyde, Gibsonburg, Woodville, Elmore, Green Springs, Ballville, Bettsville, Republic, Lindsey, Helena, Burgoon, Flat Rock, Bascom, Kansas, Stony Prairie and Whites Landing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
